articles.author: Carol Ryan
articles.title: Tech Rout May Take the Shine Off Cartier’s Owner - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Investors would like Swiss luxury group Richemont to sell its loss-making online-fashion retailer. That is unlikely with technology stocks in the doldrums.
articles.content:
A fall in the value of previously buzzy tech stocks will make it difficult for luxury company Richemont to unload its most troublesome brand, Yoox Net-a-Porter.
On Friday, shares in the maker of Car… [+502 chars]

articles.author: Vivian Salama   | Photographs by Justyna Mielnikiewicz/MAPS for The Wall Street Journal
articles.title: Ukrainian Families Risk Their Lives to Escape Russian Occupation - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Russian forces moved into the small town of Orikhiv, about 100 miles from Mariupol, soon after Moscow first ordered its invasion of Ukraine. The town’s residents faced explosions and shootings on a daily basis, forcing them to take the decision to leave.
